source_objects.title: Arts & Crafts
source_objects.description: From quilting to cake decorating, crafting inspiration to art instruction, welcome to the ultimate place for courses in arts & crafts.

items.title: How to Make Soothing and Luxurious Soap at Home Naturally
items.headline: Full Guidelines to make Soothing and Luxurious soap at home naturally
objectives_summary: How to make Soothing Cucumber Soap
How to make a milk soap using Heavy Whipping cream
How to make a milk soap using Heavy Whipping cream

items.title: Simplify Your Painting: Paint 5 Watercolor Landscapes
items.headline: Learn how to Sketch and Paint 5 Complex Watercolor Landscapes.
objectives_summary: How to create a simplified pencil sketch from 5 complex reference photographs.
How to paint houses and indicate details with minimal brushstrokes.
How to use tone to imply shadows, contrast and draw attention to certain areas of your painting.

items.title: Online Multi-Media Journalism
items.headline: Developing a Freelance Career or Getting Ready for Big Media Organizations
objectives_summary: To learn to write for radio broadcasting, both current affairs and news
To learn to write for television broadcasting, both current affairs and news
Discover the various broadcast markets to do freelance writing

items.title: Frozen 2 Elsa's costume tutorial - The bodysuit.
items.headline: Owning the most wanted costume.
objectives_summary: How to sew Lycra materials with normal sewing machine.
How to make a snowflake brooch.
How to draft traditional sewing pattern.

items.title: Rosette Fabric Flower Making
items.headline: Step by step guide to making a Rosette Fabric Flower
objectives_summary: Fabric manipulation steps in making a rosette flower
Materials Needed for this project
How to make leaves with fabric

items.title: Start Oil painting cityscape, fort, sky, river & reflection
items.headline: How to start realistic cityscape painting, forts, sunrise sunset, boats, river waves and reflection with every detail
objectives_summary: Purpose of colour blocking, underpainting
Different reflection perspectives for distant and closer, still and wavy
Paints, brushes and other materials used for the painting

items.title: How to paint a watercolor mixing chart
items.headline: master paint mixing
objectives_summary: How to mix your collection of paints and remember which ones you need to reproduce a particular hue.
Learn how to reference and understand how to use your mixing chart to achieve custom watercolor colors for your paintings.
Learn what kind of paper and paint brushes to use for this project.

items.title: Abstract Figure Painting Techniques

visible_instructors.title: Robert Joyner
visible_instructors.name: Robert
visible_instructors.job_title: Learn To Paint Loose With Acrylics & Watercolor

items.headline: Break away from rigid artwork.
objectives_summary: Basic Figure Drawing Techniques
Simplify The Figure Into Easy To Draw Shapes
Progressions Technique For Learning To Abstract The Figure

items.title: Autumn inspired Procreate digital Illustrations pattern
items.headline: Super Easy Procreate: Illustrate an Intricate Autumn Pattern
objectives_summary: Users will have a deep understanding of Procreate
How to compose and create an illustration
Learn all of the tools and brushes available

items.title: Realism - How to Paint Eyes with Color Pencil
items.headline: Learn to create photorealistic eyes with a step-by-step system, taught by Vicky Van Houten!
objectives_summary: Color pencil
Realism
Technique for creating realistic iris

items.title: Make jewelry and become a professional jewelry designer
items.headline: Learn jewelry making  and become a professional jewelry designer
objectives_summary: Students will learn how to make homemade jewelry
How to become jewelry designer
Students will learn how to make Resin jewelry

items.title: Drawing Natural Forms
items.headline: Create a beautiful sketches of natural objects
objectives_summary: Drawing Natural Forms
You will learn how to use  simple drawing techniques
You will learn how to draw natural forms from life

items.title: The Creative Process of Making Art
items.headline: Create Artistic Masterpieces through Basic Foundations of Art
objectives_summary: Creative process of making art
How to be creative or artistic
How to use intuition to guide creativity and art

items.title: Learn to Love Your Calligraphy - English Español Italiano

visible_instructors.title: Carolina Ghelfi
visible_instructors.name: Carolina
visible_instructors.job_title: Artist, Teacher & Demonstrator. Creator of BujoScrap Concept

items.headline: The course you need to take before taking another lettering or calligraphy course
objectives_summary: Getting to know and appreciate the uniqueness of your own calligraphy.
Identifying and embracing the traits of your personality, what things should stay the same and what can be improved.
Applying your own calligraphy in creative ways and in different BujoScrap projects (Bullet Journaling + Simplified Scrapbooking).

items.title: Fun art projects for kids: Master the use of chalk pastels!
items.headline: Drawing & coloring lessons for kids. Great for keeping you occupied and creative! Best for parents with kids aged 5+
objectives_summary: Drawing skills
Coloring techniques
Using chalk pastels

items.title: Creative art classes for kids and beginners with leaves
items.headline: Creative art classes for kids and beginners: make fun and create artworks with colorful leaves
objectives_summary: Make creative art pieces with colorful leaves
